description: Change of use from large House of Multiple Occupation (HMO) (Sui Generis) into two self-contained residential flats (Use Class C3); retention of existing single storey rear extension and rear garden outbuilding (part retrospective)
decision_conditions: The proposed development shall be completed within 12 months of the date of this decision notice. Failure to comply with this requirement will result in the planning permission lapsing.
Reason: To ensure an appropriate quality of accommodation, in accordance with Policy D6 of the London Plan (2021) and Policy 3.5 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings:	24024/2 (Location Plan and Site Plan); 24024/3A (Proposed Layout); 24024/5 (Existing and Proposed Elevations); 24024/6 (Proposed Section); 24024/7 (Outhouse Elevations).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).

| The cycle parking identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2 shall be brought into use prior to the first occupation of the hereby approved development and shall be permanently retained.

Reason: To provide adequate cycle storage facilities for future occupiers, in accordance with Policy T5 of the London Plan (2021). | The refuse storage identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2 shall be brought into use prior to the first occupation of the hereby approved development and shall be permanently retained.
Reason: To provide adequate refuse facilities for future occupiers, in accordance with Policy SI 7 of the London Plan (2021).

| Prior to occupation of the development, details shall be submitted to the Council for approval in writing, of an enhanced sound insulation value of at least 10dB above the ADE Building Regulations values, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas, namely, bedrooms above the communal main entrance and below kitchen/dining room and staircase/ landing to upper floor flat Approved details shall be implemented prior to occupation of the development and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site is not adversely affected by noise, in accordance with Policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 3.5 and 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
